modName: Altars and Shrines Dont Cure Diseases
summary: Exactly what it says on the tin, makes it so praying at an altar doesn't cure diseases.
descriptionHtml:
A very simple mod that changes the shrines so that they don't cure your diseases. I downloaded a few different mods that make diseases more intimidating, but those changes didn't mean much when I could still cure them with no cost to myself, and to have such an option readily available in every town.

The shrines, of course, still give you their blessings.

This mod has been checked and cleaned with TES5Edit.

This mod is incompatible with anything that edits the properties of the shrine blessings. Otherwise, it's compatible with everything.

No DLC requirements.
author: pressedham
